Unique Section ID - dealstream_opportunity_britishairways_999004 - Summarise the discussions happened between DealStream and British Airways on 16/12/2022.

Had a discovery call with Ken and Geoff VP Global sales to ascertain the pain points - they indicated that the sales process is overly complicated and they need to streamline this as well as to increase average deal size.They want to be able to better service their existing clients by improving their customer success rates to help protect their renewal rates. They use salesforce and Gong.io as well as outreach for their early stage lead generation. They have too many disparet sales systems Want to provide a seamless unified platform expereince allowing the user to do majority of the work in one application

The demo session went well. The yindicated that they loved the UI/ UX however would need to ensure that the integration with their whole tech stack including Gong would be something that we could do. Need to set up a call with their team and our product management team to give them confidence that this integration work can be delivered. In addition there was some concern around data privacy which they need their Data Privacy team to look into. I have asked them to send us thier DPA which they will hopefully do by end of the week.
